message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CV 

This paper deals with natural language processing tasks, specifically sentence embeddings, which are commonly studied in the sub-category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The use of weighted averages and soft projections suggests that this paper may also fall under the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper mentions a specific task related to clinical semantic textual similarity, which could place it under the sub-category of information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the use of word vectors and projections may also suggest a connection to computer vision (cs.CV), which often deals with similar mathematical representations.
